dcterms:creator: Zan Wang
Yixin Chen
Tengyu Liu
Yixin Zhu
Wei Liang
Siyuan Huang
dcterms:description: The HUMANISE dataset is used for training and testing methods that generate human motions in 3D scenes based on text descriptions, focusing on human-object interactions.
dcterms:title: HUMANISE dataset

dcterms:creator: Mohamed Hassan
Vasileios Choutas
Dimitrios Tzionas
Michael J. Black
dcterms:description: The PROX dataset is utilized to evaluate the generalization of the proposed method to unseen scenes without fine-tuning.
dcterms:title: PROX dataset

dcterms:creator: Naureen Mahmood
Nima Ghorbani
Nikolaus F Troje
Gerard Pons-Moll
Michael J Black
dcterms:description: The AMASS dataset is referenced for pre-training models to improve motion quality before fine-tuning on the HUMANISE dataset.
dcterms:title: AMASS dataset

dcterms:creator: Matthias Plappert
Christian Mandery
Tamim Asfour
dcterms:description: The KIT-ML dataset is the first benchmark for text-driven motion generation, providing a foundation for evaluating motion synthesis methods.
dcterms:title: KIT-ML dataset

dcterms:creator: Abhinanda R. Punnakkal
Arjun Chandrasekaran
Nikos Athanasiou
Alejandra Quiros-Ramirez
Michael J. Black
dcterms:description: The Babel dataset is mentioned as a resource that provides action labels and text annotations for the AMASS dataset, enhancing its usability for motion generation tasks.
dcterms:title: Babel dataset
